name: prompt-builder
title: Prompt Builder
description: Prompt Builder helps you craft clear, consistent AI prompts through a simple form. Define roles, tone, audience, and constraints to get better results faster. Then copy them instantly into your favorite AI tool.
author: koala1206

commands.name: index
commands.title: Prompt Builder
commands.description: Design clear, consistent prompts in seconds

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
